settings.quote:
Shailesh Rai

I've been using shaving foams for the last 25 years and have used nearly all brands like Gillette, Park Avenue, Old Spice, VI John, Aspen, Nivea etc. But this one is the finest of them all. Very smooth, very silky and very refreshing.

Gaurav Gupta

Very light and gentle shaving foam unlike most shaving foams, I highly recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin. Love the fresh scent and after shave feel of this product.

Vikrant

So I ordered this a few days back and I am a person who shaves daily. I actually felt easy to shave this time because of its extra softness. The fragrance is really manly and strong.
